short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: save the urls of open tabs in a text file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever had several tabs open and wanted to quickly save them for later? With Raincheck, now you can! With the click of a button, Raincheck takes the urls of your current pages, organizes and titles them and saves the information in a convenient text file.

The default name for the text file is the current date and time, but there is also an option for you to give the file a custom name. File downloads to your downloads folder.
